issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implementation of physical binary expression get_type method is incorrect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9799](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9799). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implementation of physical binary expression get_type method is incorrect. This needs to be implemented correctly, with tests.

More detail can be found in the conversation here: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7998#issuecomment-676356936

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9799?focusedCommentId=17182859) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
I do not really know what is incorrect here, but wasn't this fixed together with ARROW-9809, `[~andygrove]` ?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9799?focusedCommentId=17206835) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
`[~jorgecarleitao]` yes, I think this was addressed now
